DOC.brief_summary: This study design explore new approach help people chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) become physically active . Through weekly telephone session health coach utilize motivational interviewing , participant empower set goal increase physical activity ( emphasis walking ) . The objective study determine telephone-based health coach reasonable effective way increase physical activity , measure gold-standard activity monitor , people COPD .
DOC.brief_title: Physical Activity Coaching Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease ( COPD )
DOC.criteria: Men woman age 40 year old Current former cigarette smoker least 10 packyears Diagnosis COPD stage II IV COPD document pulmonary function test ( FEV1 < 80 % predict , FEV1/FVC ration < 0.71 ) within past 24 month Able ambulate independently walk aid ( wheeled standard walker cane ) Unable walk without assistance another person patient high likelihood lose followup contact ( patient active chemical dependency ) , plan move state , able contact telephone patient inability provide good data follow command ( patient disorient severe neurologic/psychiatric condition )
